page.title: 06FARMING TODAY
page.content: The farm land in this area is mostly owner occupied. The main crops are Barley and Wheat with Oil Seed Rape and Sugar Beet as break crops. Some farmers keep beast, one keeps sheep and there are 2 Egg and Chicken stations. There are now no Cows milked at all. There are 7 working farms now and all of them have land in other areas. One is a depot for Potatoes although there is hardly any grown in this area. Most of the farm workers are only Part Time, working in the harvesting of the crop and cultivating and drilling of the next. There are only a few Full Time workers now because of the bigger tractors and machines doing more work. Chemical spraying and Straw Burning is carried out although farmers are becoming more aware of Conservation and Tree Planting is taking place.
